values:
Put some excitement between your legs.

RIDE A HORSE! ;)

There's a story to tell

if you care to listen

In his big kind eyes

there's a mischievous glisten.

 

I think he uderstands,

you gotta cut loose

And fly like the wind

by the seat o'yer caboose.

 

He's a good teacher

'cause he's not rigid to rules

He allows me to learn

or like a fool.

 

He's a bigger than me

and twice my age.

He gently guides me

through each learnin' stage.

 

When I make a mistake

he don't throw a fit.

When the goin' gets tough

I know he won't quit.

 

When I go out to catch him

and the halter's a tangle,

He just stands there waitin'

till I get the right angle.

 

'Round our barn

all the younger horses

Are learnin' his ways

by takin' his courses.

 

But after he's gone

all the other's I'll compare

To his disposition

and his gentle care.

 

GOD take great care

creating this creature

You gave him patience

to be my teacher.

 

-Erica

You left me without a word

You played me like a game                                                                             

My heart is dying right now

I can never go back feeling the same

 

My heart is very fragile

It is not that strong

Why do you leave me?

Now I can't move on

 

You promise you'll love me always

But actually you lied

Now you go with another girl

All I do is cry

 

I think about you and me

Then my eyes start to shed some tears

Missing you so much

Wishing you were here

 

Everyday my heart aches more

My tears are turning into drops of rain

Oh you hurt me so, so much

Nothing can stop my pain

 

Now I know that love is just a game

Because it has so many players

I guess you are one of them

And I am a player hater

 

You played me like a fool

You said we'd always be together forever

You didn't keep the words you say

Now I know that forever means...never

 

-Erica

THIS IS TO MOST OF MY EXS'..............

Today was like "The Best!" I had no homework except for Geometry :(..I SO TOTALLY rocked in concert band and jazz band. It was kickin' let me tell ya. :) Everyone was like so nice today for a monday anyway. Expectually this one guy that I REALLY like, but am too affraid to tell him to his face because I don't know if he likes me or not. And he's SO nice and plays sports which is really *hot*. ;) I just love a band geek. lol!! After school, Jerica Yingling came over and we chilled out on the computer, made BLT's(mmmmmmm), did my geometry, and Michael Jessie took us to feed and play w/ my horses. But before we were online and Tom Burch said he was going to take a shower and come over, but never did. That Jerk Face..lol..so we wasted chillin' time for him. Then Jerica and I came back and she had to leave because it was like 8:00pm. and she had to do homework and junk. I leaped into her arms and told her not to go, but she said she must so I threw her out the door..haha..not really. Now, I'm here with my Geometry STILL not all done, but oh well. Well, I'm gonna BoUnCe on outa here and get something to eat even though there's NOTHING in my house SOOO if you know how to cook. CALL ME-948-5198...please. I'm starvin' over here! :) L-A-T-E-R

All of your anger and frustration, you mask it
You'll be running from troubles until you're in your
                       casket.
        Your parents continuously make you mad.
         But it isn't always your mom and dad.
   Your brother makes you cry, he pushes you away.
Even if you desired it, you wouldn't get the time of day.
        You're also troubled by unfaithful friends
           Ruining your joy and taking your men.
        You fall to your knees and cry out "Oh, God,
        Won't you please tell me where I went wrong?"
You don't receive your answer and you want to give up hope.
    "I'm slipping, Father, closer to the end of my rope."
       You break down and sob, tears filling your eyes.
          Keeping your faith, you gaze to the skies.
    "I come agian, Father, though I never left Your care
           I know no matter what:  You're there."
  Through all your awful times, maintain this perspective.
     Always place Him first and you'll stay strong and 
                        protected.
      There's no sure way to say how your story ends.
    It's up to you to choose, so choose wisely my friend.
                                      
                                     -Susan Bricker

THANKS SUSAN FOR WRITING THAT FOR ME. I LOVE YA GURL AND ALWAYS WILL.

*I am so bored!!!!!!!!!  

*I was supposed to go trail riding today, but it rained.  That makes me angry, but i'm SO going tomorrow.  Well, I have to go to bed now and get up at 5:00am to get the horses loaded. 

*I can't wait till school Monday.  I miss my friends already. :(  Peace out..
